dcterms:creator: M. Schedl
dcterms:description: The LFM dataset sample used in our study is based on the LFM-1b dataset and contains listening records from the music streaming platform Last.fm. It includes genre information acquired by indexing Last.fmâ€™s user-generated tags with the 20 main genres from the AllMusic database.
dcterms:title: Last.fm (LFM)

dcterms:creator: F.M. Harper
J.A. Konstan
dcterms:description: The ML dataset sample is based on the ML-1M dataset provided by the University of Minnesota. It contains genre information for movies and includes 18 distinct genres.
dcterms:title: MovieLens (ML)

dcterms:creator: D. Kowald
E. Lacic
dcterms:description: The MAL dataset is based on a recommender systems challenge dataset provided by Kaggle. It contains genre information for each anime and includes implicit feedback.
dcterms:title: MyAnimeList (MAL)
